authorization_captures.sql:
CREATE TABLE authorization_captures (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	authorization_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	amount_currency_code VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, 
	amount_value VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	status VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, 
	final_capture BOOLEAN NOT NULL, 
	create_time DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	update_time DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	disbursement_mode VARCHAR(20), 
	invoice_id VARCHAR(127), 
	note_to_payer TEXT, 
	raw_response JSON, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

balance_snapshots.sql:
CREATE TABLE balance_snapshots (
	id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	merchant_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	account_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	currency VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, 
	total_balance NUMERIC(19, 2) NOT NULL, 
	available_balance NUMERIC(19, 2) NOT NULL, 
	withheld_balance NUMERIC(19, 2) NOT NULL, 
	snapshot_time DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	created_at DATETIME, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

billing_plans.sql:
CREATE TABLE billing_plans (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	product_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	name VARCHAR(127) NOT NULL, 
	description VARCHAR(127), 
	status VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, 
	billing_cycles JSON NOT NULL, 
	payment_preferences JSON, 
	taxes JSON, 
	quantity_supported BOOLEAN, 
	create_time DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	update_time DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	tenant_id VARCHAR(50), 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

billing_subscriptions.sql:
CREATE TABLE billing_subscriptions (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	tenant_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	plan_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	status_update_time DATETIME, 
	plan_overridden BOOLEAN, 
	start_time DATETIME, 
	create_time DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
	update_time DATETIME, 
	quantity VARCHAR(32), 
	custom_id VARCHAR(127), 
	shipping_amount JSON, 
	subscriber JSON, 
	billing_info JSON, 
	application_context JSON, 
	plan_details JSON, 
	merchant_inventory JSON, 
	extra_data JSON, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

capture_refunds.sql:
CREATE TABLE capture_refunds (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	capture_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	amount_currency_code VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, 
	amount_value VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	status VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, 
	invoice_id VARCHAR(127), 
	note_to_payer VARCHAR(255), 
	create_time DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	update_time DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	raw_response JSON, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

catalog_products.sql:
CREATE TABLE catalog_products (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	name VARCHAR(127) NOT NULL, 
	description VARCHAR(256), 
	type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	category VARCHAR(50), 
	image_url VARCHAR(2000), 
	home_url VARCHAR(2000), 
	create_time DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	update_time DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	is_active BOOLEAN NOT NULL, 
	client_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	user_id VARCHAR(36), 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(client_id) REFERENCES oauth_clients (client_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES users (id)
)

checkout_orders.sql:
CREATE TABLE checkout_orders (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	status VARCHAR(21) NOT NULL, 
	intent VARCHAR(9) NOT NULL, 
	payer_id VARCHAR(50), 
	payer_email VARCHAR(254), 
	payer_name JSON, 
	payer_address JSON, 
	payment_source JSON, 
	application_context JSON, 
	processing_instruction VARCHAR(50), 
	create_time DATETIME, 
	update_time DATETIME, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

customer_disputes.sql:
CREATE TABLE customer_disputes (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	merchant_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
	dispute_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	disputed_transaction_id VARCHAR(100), 
	reason VARCHAR(39) NOT NULL, 
	status VARCHAR(27) NOT NULL, 
	dispute_state VARCHAR(27), 
	dispute_life_cycle_stage VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, 
	dispute_channel VARCHAR(24) NOT NULL, 
	dispute_amount_value NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL, 
	dispute_amount_currency VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, 
	buyer_email VARCHAR(255), 
	seller_email VARCHAR(255), 
	buyer_name VARCHAR(255), 
	seller_name VARCHAR(255), 
	buyer_message TEXT, 
	seller_response TEXT, 
	evidence_documents TEXT, 
	dispute_outcome TEXT, 
	resolution_reason VARCHAR(100), 
	create_time DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	update_time DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	seller_response_due_date DATETIME, 
	buyer_response_due_date DATETIME, 
	resolved_time DATETIME, 
	external_id VARCHAR(100), 
	notes TEXT, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

generated_invoice_numbers.sql:
CREATE TABLE generated_invoice_numbers (
	id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	invoice_number VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
	merchant_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
	sequence_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	generated_at DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	generated_by VARCHAR(100), 
	request_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	is_used BOOLEAN NOT NULL, 
	used_at DATETIME, 
	invoice_id VARCHAR(100), 
	extra_metadata JSON, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

invoice_activities.sql:
CREATE TABLE invoice_activities (
	id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	invoice_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	old_status VARCHAR(30), 
	new_status VARCHAR(30), 
	activity_date DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	performed_by VARCHAR(100), 
	details JSON, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(invoice_id) REFERENCES invoices (id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)

invoice_items.sql:
CREATE TABLE invoice_items (
	id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	invoice_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	name VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, 
	description VARCHAR(1000), 
	quantity VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	unit_amount_value VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	unit_amount_currency VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, 
	tax_name VARCHAR(20), 
	tax_percent VARCHAR(10), 
	tax_amount_value VARCHAR(20), 
	tax_amount_currency VARCHAR(3), 
	discount_percent VARCHAR(10), 
	discount_amount_value VARCHAR(20), 
	discount_amount_currency VARCHAR(3), 
	item_date VARCHAR(10), 
	unit_of_measure VARCHAR(100), 
	line_total VARCHAR(20), 
	position INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(invoice_id) REFERENCES invoices (id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)

invoice_number_sequences.sql:
CREATE TABLE invoice_number_sequences (
	id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	merchant_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
	prefix VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	current_number INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	suffix_pattern VARCHAR(50), 
	created_at DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	updated_at DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	is_active BOOLEAN NOT NULL, 
	padding_zeros INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	reset_yearly BOOLEAN NOT NULL, 
	reset_monthly BOOLEAN NOT NULL, 
	last_reset_date DATETIME, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

invoice_payments.sql:
CREATE TABLE invoice_payments (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	invoice_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	payment_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	payment_method VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, 
	payment_date VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, 
	amount_value VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	amount_currency VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, 
	transaction_id VARCHAR(100), 
	note TEXT, 
	shipping_info JSON, 
	created_at DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	created_by VARCHAR(100), 
	merchant_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
	is_partial BOOLEAN NOT NULL, 
	remaining_balance VARCHAR(20), 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(invoice_id) REFERENCES invoices (id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)

invoice_templates.sql:
CREATE TABLE invoice_templates (
	id VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, 
	name VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL, 
	merchant_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	default_template BOOLEAN, 
	standard_template BOOLEAN, 
	unit_of_measure VARCHAR(20), 
	template_info JSON, 
	settings JSON, 
	created_at DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	created_by VARCHAR(255), 
	updated_at DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	updated_by VARCHAR(255), 
	deleted BOOLEAN, 
	deleted_at DATETIME, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

invoices.sql:
CREATE TABLE invoices (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	invoice_number VARCHAR(25), 
	status VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, 
	reference VARCHAR(120), 
	invoice_date VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, 
	currency_code VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, 
	note TEXT, 
	term TEXT, 
	memo VARCHAR(500), 
	payment_term_type VARCHAR(30), 
	due_date VARCHAR(10), 
	invoicer JSON NOT NULL, 
	primary_recipients JSON NOT NULL, 
	configuration JSON, 
	subtotal VARCHAR(20), 
	total_amount VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	total_currency VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, 
	due_amount VARCHAR(20), 
	amount_breakdown JSON, 
	created_at DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	updated_at DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	sent_at DATETIME, 
	scheduled_at DATETIME, 
	paid_at DATETIME, 
	cancelled_at DATETIME, 
	merchant_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
	created_by VARCHAR(100), 
	last_modified_by VARCHAR(100), 
	links JSON, 
	notification_settings JSON, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

oauth_access_tokens.sql:
CREATE TABLE oauth_access_tokens (
	id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	token VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL, 
	client_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	scopes TEXT NOT NULL, 
	expires_at DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	nonce VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	is_revoked BOOLEAN, 
	created_at DATETIME, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(client_id) REFERENCES oauth_clients (client_id)
)

oauth_clients.sql:
CREATE TABLE oauth_clients (
	id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	client_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	client_secret VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL, 
	app_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	app_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	is_active BOOLEAN, 
	scopes TEXT NOT NULL, 
	created_at DATETIME, 
	updated_at DATETIME, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	UNIQUE (app_id)
)

oauth_refresh_tokens.sql:
CREATE TABLE oauth_refresh_tokens (
	id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	token VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL, 
	access_token_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	client_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	expires_at DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	is_revoked BOOLEAN, 
	created_at DATETIME, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(access_token_id) REFERENCES oauth_access_tokens (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(client_id) REFERENCES oauth_clients (client_id)
)

order_authorizations.sql:
CREATE TABLE order_authorizations (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	order_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	purchase_unit_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	amount_currency_code VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, 
	amount_value VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	invoice_id VARCHAR(127), 
	custom_id VARCHAR(127), 
	seller_protection JSON, 
	processor_response JSON, 
	create_time DATETIME, 
	update_time DATETIME, 
	expiration_time DATETIME, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(order_id) REFERENCES checkout_orders (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(purchase_unit_id) REFERENCES order_purchase_units (id)
)

order_captures.sql:
CREATE TABLE order_captures (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	order_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	purchase_unit_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	amount_currency_code VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, 
	amount_value VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	invoice_id VARCHAR(127), 
	custom_id VARCHAR(127), 
	final_capture INTEGER, 
	seller_protection JSON, 
	seller_receivable_breakdown JSON, 
	processor_response JSON, 
	network_transaction_reference JSON, 
	create_time DATETIME, 
	update_time DATETIME, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(order_id) REFERENCES checkout_orders (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(purchase_unit_id) REFERENCES order_purchase_units (id)
)

order_items.sql:
CREATE TABLE order_items (
	id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	purchase_unit_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	name VARCHAR(127) NOT NULL, 
	quantity VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, 
	unit_currency_code VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, 
	unit_value VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	tax_currency_code VARCHAR(3), 
	tax_value VARCHAR(20), 
	description VARCHAR(127), 
	sku VARCHAR(127), 
	category VARCHAR(20), 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(purchase_unit_id) REFERENCES order_purchase_units (id)
)

order_purchase_units.sql:
CREATE TABLE order_purchase_units (
	id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	order_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	reference_id VARCHAR(256), 
	currency_code VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, 
	value VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	amount_breakdown JSON, 
	payee_email VARCHAR(254), 
	payee_merchant_id VARCHAR(13), 
	description VARCHAR(127), 
	custom_id VARCHAR(127), 
	invoice_id VARCHAR(127), 
	soft_descriptor VARCHAR(22), 
	payment_instruction JSON, 
	shipping JSON, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(order_id) REFERENCES checkout_orders (id)
)

order_tracking.sql:
CREATE TABLE order_tracking (
	id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	order_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	capture_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	tracking_number VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, 
	carrier VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	notify_payer INTEGER, 
	items JSON, 
	create_time DATETIME, 
	update_time DATETIME, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(order_id) REFERENCES checkout_orders (id)
)

partner_referrals.sql:
CREATE TABLE partner_referrals (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	partner_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
	tracking_id VARCHAR(127), 
	customer_email VARCHAR(254), 
	preferred_language VARCHAR(10), 
	legal_country_code VARCHAR(2), 
	business_entity JSON, 
	individual_owners JSON, 
	operations JSON NOT NULL, 
	products JSON, 
	capabilities JSON, 
	legal_consents JSON NOT NULL, 
	partner_config JSON, 
	status VARCHAR(11) NOT NULL, 
	action_url TEXT, 
	action_url_expiry DATETIME, 
	return_url TEXT, 
	created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
	updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

payment_authorizations.sql:
CREATE TABLE payment_authorizations (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	status VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, 
	amount_currency_code VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, 
	amount_value VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	invoice_id VARCHAR(127), 
	custom_id VARCHAR(255), 
	reason_code VARCHAR(50), 
	seller_protection_status VARCHAR(50), 
	seller_protection_dispute_categories JSON, 
	processor_avs_code VARCHAR(10), 
	processor_cvv_code VARCHAR(10), 
	processor_response_code VARCHAR(10), 
	create_time DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	update_time DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	expiration_time DATETIME, 
	order_id VARCHAR(50), 
	payer_email VARCHAR(254), 
	payer_id VARCHAR(50), 
	merchant_id VARCHAR(50), 
	raw_response JSON, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

payout_batches.sql:
CREATE TABLE payout_batches (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	tenant_id VARCHAR(100), 
	sender_batch_id VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, 
	payout_batch_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	recipient_type VARCHAR(20), 
	email_subject VARCHAR(255), 
	email_message VARCHAR(1000), 
	note VARCHAR(165), 
	batch_status VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, 
	total_amount FLOAT, 
	total_fee FLOAT, 
	currency VARCHAR(3), 
	total_items INTEGER, 
	processed_items INTEGER, 
	errors_count INTEGER, 
	time_created DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
	time_completed DATETIME, 
	time_updated DATETIME, 
	sender_info JSON, 
	batch_metadata JSON, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	UNIQUE (payout_batch_id)
)

payout_items.sql:
CREATE TABLE payout_items (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	payout_batch_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	tenant_id VARCHAR(100), 
	payout_item_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	sender_item_id VARCHAR(256), 
	transaction_id VARCHAR(50), 
	activity_id VARCHAR(50), 
	recipient_type VARCHAR(20), 
	receiver VARCHAR(127) NOT NULL, 
	recipient_wallet VARCHAR(20), 
	amount FLOAT NOT NULL, 
	currency VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, 
	fee_amount FLOAT, 
	fee_currency VARCHAR(3), 
	transaction_status VARCHAR(9) NOT NULL, 
	note VARCHAR(165), 
	notification_language VARCHAR(10), 
	alternate_notification JSON, 
	application_context JSON, 
	currency_conversion JSON, 
	errors JSON, 
	time_processed DATETIME, 
	created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
	updated_at DATETIME, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(payout_batch_id) REFERENCES payout_batches (id), 
	UNIQUE (payout_item_id)
)

referenced_payout_batches.sql:
CREATE TABLE referenced_payout_batches (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	tenant_id VARCHAR(100), 
	batch_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	sender_batch_id VARCHAR(256), 
	batch_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	total_items FLOAT NOT NULL, 
	processed_items FLOAT NOT NULL, 
	success_items FLOAT NOT NULL, 
	failed_items FLOAT NOT NULL, 
	total_amount FLOAT NOT NULL, 
	currency VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, 
	total_fee FLOAT, 
	time_created DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	time_completed DATETIME, 
	batch_metadata JSON, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	UNIQUE (batch_id)
)

referenced_payout_items.sql:
CREATE TABLE referenced_payout_items (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	tenant_id VARCHAR(100), 
	payout_item_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	payout_batch_id VARCHAR(50), 
	reference_id VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, 
	reference_type VARCHAR(14) NOT NULL, 
	processing_state VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, 
	sender_item_id VARCHAR(256), 
	recipient_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	receiver VARCHAR(127) NOT NULL, 
	recipient_wallet VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, 
	amount FLOAT NOT NULL, 
	currency VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, 
	fee_amount FLOAT, 
	fee_currency VARCHAR(3), 
	note VARCHAR(165), 
	transaction_id VARCHAR(50), 
	activity_id VARCHAR(50), 
	time_created DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	time_completed DATETIME, 
	time_processed DATETIME, 
	errors JSON, 
	item_metadata JSON, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	UNIQUE (payout_item_id)
)

referral_events.sql:
CREATE TABLE referral_events (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	referral_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	event_data JSON, 
	event_timestamp DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
	actor_type VARCHAR(50), 
	actor_id VARCHAR(100), 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(referral_id) REFERENCES partner_referrals (id)
)

reporting_balances.sql:
CREATE TABLE reporting_balances (
	id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	merchant_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	account_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	currency VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, 
	is_primary BOOLEAN, 
	total_balance NUMERIC(19, 2) NOT NULL, 
	available_balance NUMERIC(19, 2) NOT NULL, 
	withheld_balance NUMERIC(19, 2) NOT NULL, 
	pending_balance NUMERIC(19, 2) NOT NULL, 
	reserve_balance NUMERIC(19, 2) NOT NULL, 
	instant_balance NUMERIC(19, 2) NOT NULL, 
	as_of_time DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	last_refresh_time DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	created_at DATETIME, 
	updated_at DATETIME, 
	deleted BOOLEAN, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

reporting_transactions.sql:
CREATE TABLE reporting_transactions (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	transaction_id VARCHAR(19) NOT NULL, 
	merchant_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	paypal_account_id VARCHAR(50), 
	transaction_event_code VARCHAR(10), 
	transaction_type VARCHAR(50), 
	transaction_status VARCHAR(1), 
	transaction_subject VARCHAR(255), 
	transaction_note VARCHAR(255), 
	invoice_id VARCHAR(50), 
	custom_field VARCHAR(255), 
	protection_eligibility VARCHAR(50), 
	credit_term VARCHAR(50), 
	payment_method_type VARCHAR(50), 
	instrument_type VARCHAR(50), 
	instrument_sub_type VARCHAR(50), 
	bank_reference_id VARCHAR(100), 
	credit_transaction_reference VARCHAR(100), 
	transaction_initiation_date DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	transaction_updated_date DATETIME, 
	created_at DATETIME, 
	updated_at DATETIME, 
	transaction_amount NUMERIC(19, 2), 
	transaction_currency VARCHAR(3), 
	fee_amount NUMERIC(19, 2), 
	fee_currency VARCHAR(3), 
	insurance_amount NUMERIC(19, 2), 
	shipping_amount NUMERIC(19, 2), 
	shipping_discount_amount NUMERIC(19, 2), 
	ending_balance NUMERIC(19, 2), 
	available_balance NUMERIC(19, 2), 
	balance_affecting BOOLEAN, 
	deleted BOOLEAN, 
	payer_info JSON, 
	shipping_info JSON, 
	cart_info JSON, 
	store_info JSON, 
	auction_info JSON, 
	incentive_info JSON, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

shipping_trackers.sql:
CREATE TABLE shipping_trackers (
	id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	merchant_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	transaction_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	tracking_number VARCHAR(64), 
	tracking_number_type VARCHAR(50), 
	status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	shipment_date DATE, 
	last_updated_time DATETIME, 
	carrier VARCHAR(50), 
	carrier_name_other VARCHAR(64), 
	postage_payment_id VARCHAR(64), 
	notify_buyer BOOLEAN, 
	quantity INTEGER, 
	tracking_number_validated BOOLEAN, 
	created_at DATETIME, 
	updated_at DATETIME, 
	deleted BOOLEAN, 
	additional_info JSON, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

tracking_events.sql:
CREATE TABLE tracking_events (
	id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	merchant_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	tracker_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	transaction_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	old_value VARCHAR(255), 
	new_value VARCHAR(255), 
	event_description VARCHAR(500), 
	event_time DATETIME, 
	triggered_by VARCHAR(255), 
	event_data JSON, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

user_access_tokens.sql:
CREATE TABLE user_access_tokens (
	id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	user_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	access_token_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	created_at DATETIME, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES users (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(access_token_id) REFERENCES oauth_access_tokens (id)
)

users.sql:
CREATE TABLE users (
	id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	payer_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	email_verified BOOLEAN, 
	username VARCHAR(255), 
	name VARCHAR(255), 
	given_name VARCHAR(255), 
	family_name VARCHAR(255), 
	middle_name VARCHAR(255), 
	picture TEXT, 
	gender VARCHAR(50), 
	birthdate VARCHAR(50), 
	zoneinfo VARCHAR(100), 
	locale VARCHAR(10), 
	phone_number VARCHAR(50), 
	phone_number_verified BOOLEAN, 
	address TEXT, 
	account_type VARCHAR(50), 
	verified_account BOOLEAN, 
	age_range VARCHAR(20), 
	account_status VARCHAR(50), 
	account_creation_date DATETIME, 
	updated_at DATETIME, 
	last_login_at DATETIME, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	UNIQUE (username)
)

vault_payment_tokens.sql:
CREATE TABLE vault_payment_tokens (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	setup_token_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	customer_id VARCHAR(100), 
	merchant_customer_id VARCHAR(100), 
	payment_source_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	payment_source_data JSON NOT NULL, 
	tenant_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
	client_id VARCHAR(100), 
	created_at DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	metadata_json JSON, 
	is_active BOOLEAN NOT NULL, 
	is_primary BOOLEAN NOT NULL, 
	last_used_at DATETIME, 
	usage_count VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

vault_setup_tokens.sql:
CREATE TABLE vault_setup_tokens (
	id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	customer_id VARCHAR(100), 
	merchant_customer_id VARCHAR(100), 
	payment_source_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	payment_source_data JSON NOT NULL, 
	status VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, 
	approval_url TEXT, 
	approved_at DATETIME, 
	request_id VARCHAR(100), 
	tenant_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
	client_id VARCHAR(100), 
	created_at DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	updated_at DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	expires_at DATETIME, 
	experience_context JSON, 
	additional_data JSON, 
	verification_status VARCHAR(50), 
	verification_method VARCHAR(50), 
	converted_to_payment_token BOOLEAN NOT NULL, 
	payment_token_id VARCHAR(50), 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

vaulted_credit_cards.sql:
CREATE TABLE vaulted_credit_cards (
	id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	card_number_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	card_number_masked VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	card_number_last4 VARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, 
	card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	expire_month INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	expire_year INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	first_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
	last_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
	billing_address JSON, 
	payer_id VARCHAR(255), 
	external_customer_id VARCHAR(256), 
	external_card_id VARCHAR(255), 
	merchant_id VARCHAR(255), 
	state VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
	is_active BOOLEAN, 
	valid_until DATETIME, 
	create_time DATETIME, 
	update_time DATETIME, 
	user_id VARCHAR(255), 
	client_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES users (id) ON DELETE CASCADE, 
	FOREIGN KEY(client_id) REFERENCES oauth_clients (client_id)
)

web_profiles.sql:
CREATE TABLE web_profiles (
	id VARCHAR(22) NOT NULL, 
	merchant_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	"temporary" BOOLEAN, 
	flow_config JSON, 
	input_fields JSON, 
	presentation JSON, 
	created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 
	updated_at DATETIME, 
	expires_at DATETIME, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

webhook_event_subscriptions.sql:
CREATE TABLE webhook_event_subscriptions (
	webhook_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
	event_type_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	PRIMARY KEY (webhook_id, event_type_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(webhook_id) REFERENCES webhooks (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(event_type_id) REFERENCES webhook_event_types (id)
)

webhook_event_types.sql:
CREATE TABLE webhook_event_types (
	id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	description TEXT NOT NULL, 
	status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	resource_versions JSON, 
	category VARCHAR(100), 
	created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 
	updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

webhook_lookup_event_types.sql:
CREATE TABLE webhook_lookup_event_types (
	id VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL, 
	webhook_id VARCHAR(17) NOT NULL, 
	event_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	description TEXT, 
	status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	resource_versions JSON, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(webhook_id) REFERENCES webhook_lookups (id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)

webhook_lookups.sql:
CREATE TABLE webhook_lookups (
	id VARCHAR(17) NOT NULL, 
	tenant_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	url TEXT NOT NULL, 
	app_id VARCHAR(255), 
	status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	create_time DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	update_time DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

webhooks.sql:
CREATE TABLE webhooks (
	id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
	url VARCHAR(2048) NOT NULL, 
	merchant_id VARCHAR(100), 
	status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 
	updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)
